body: I would prefer Ash with Lillie, Mallow, and Lana foursome. Brock and Misty should have been the last focus instead.

It seems to me that Lillie might be the least favorite character of the author and just wanted to get it over with as quickly as possible. I myself am not a fan of Lillie so this didn’t bother me much. I kinda expected Lana and Mallow to have been more included though.
I agree,Lana and Mallow just stayed there,masturbating it was like they didnt appear this time instead of joining them,and the genderbent ash with brock was useless and bad

I'm a huge fan of PM Gals series, but this time i'm afraid to say that i'm really disappointed with this one. I was expected much more but the job is really lack and totally unnecessary the final scene of female Ash if Lillie is the main of this one. Kousaka Jun is still one of my favs, but this work is the worst one of this series in my opinion. Something better could be make, considering the popularity of Lillie.
Is finally here!!! I was expecting this one since the first of the alolan came out. I gotta say it lack a little bit, but either way i'm satisfied.
Hmm... as much as I love Kousaka Jun’s work, this one was a bit lacking and kind of a let down compared to his previous works.
